steps.name: the response should contain a list of tags
I have user data with firstName "John", lastName "Doe", and email "JohnDoe@example.com"
I update the user's firstName to "John"
the update response status should be 200
the delete response status should be 200
the response should contain a list of users
I have an existing user with firstName "Rini", lastName "Agustina", email "riniAgustina@example.com"
I have user data with firstName "Budi" and lastName "Santoso" but no email
the create response status should be 400
